name: Century Aluminum Company
description: Century Aluminum Company is a leading producer of primary aluminum and operates several facilities in the United States and around the world. Founded in 1995, the company specializes in the manufacturing of high-quality aluminum products used in various industries, including automotive, aerospace, and construction. Century Aluminum's operations are characterized by their focus on sustainability and efficiency, leveraging advanced technologies to minimize environmental impact while maximizing output. The company operates smelters in Kentucky and South Carolina, producing aluminum products that meet the highest industry standards. Century Aluminum is committed to responsible sourcing and production practices, aligning with global efforts to reduce carbon emissions and promote sustainable development. With a strong emphasis on innovation, the company is continuously exploring new ways to improve its production processes and product offerings. Century Aluminum’s strategic vision includes expanding its market presence while maintaining a focus on operational excellence and customer satisfaction, making it a key player in the global aluminum industry.
